hero.title.message: Make Obsidian More Productive, More Simple

hero.subtitle.message: Simplicity meets power, Revolutionizing your Obsidian experience

hero.demo.quickCapture.description.message: Capture your thoughts instantly with a single click.

hero.demo.journalTemplate.description.message: Create daily journal entries with structured templates.

hero.demo.projectSetup.description.message: Set up project structures and templates with one click.

hero.demo.aiPoweredNote.description.message: Generate AI-powered notes and summaries effortlessly.

features.subtitle.message: Create powerful workflows with a simple, visual form builder — fully yours.

features.noCode.description.message: no coding required, no technical skills needed, no hassle, use visual form builder to create your own workflows

features.efficiency.description.message: One-Action to create structured notes, completed projects, capture ideas, Turn thoughts into action — faster

features.thinkBeyond.description.message: Script mode for advanced users, build complex workflows, automate tasks, and integrate with other tools, all it depends on your imagination.

features.openSource.description.message: fully open source, you can contribute, fork, and customize it to your needs

features.community.description.message: Join a growing community of users and developers, share your workflows, and get inspired by others
